summary: This adds a Medium sized basement connecting all houses and Popular areas. You can enter the Hideout from any house in the game by opening the hatch found on in your house. Includes everything you could need.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]
DESCRIPTION:[/color]
This adds a Medium sized basement connecting all houses in the game. You can enter the Hideout from any house in the game by opening the hatch found on in your house. This is the COMPACT version of Dovahkiin's Hideout.

[color=yellow]FEATURES:[/color]
- Crafting Room (all tools)
- 50+ Weapon Racks
- Alchemy/Enchanting Tables
- Labeled Chests for better Organization
- 8 Mannequins
- Cooking area
- Dragon-Priest Mask Holder
- Door Room (Entry from all houses in Skyrim.)
- Much more
author: shawkab
